title: Never Done: Women, Work and History
abstract: Women in the workplace from the mid-1800s - 1970s.
description: 'Never done: women, work and history'. Focuses on women in the workplace from the mid-1800s through to the 1970s including footage of the first women's union (1882); industrialisation and factory work; the birth of the modern office worker (1890s); equal pay for equal work movement; WWI and WWII women in the workforce; trade-unionism and feminism.
